thread.title: Thousands of male ducklings are scalded to death every day | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Thousands of male ducklings are scalded to death every day | Daily Mail Online

author: Tracy You For Mailonline
title: Thousands of male ducklings are scalded to death every day | Daily Mail Online
text: Unwanted and scalded to death: Thousands of male ducklings are cruelly killed every day in a Chinese hatchery because they can't lay eggs WARNING: GRAPHIC CONTENT New images reveal how workers used a spoon net to kill the birds in hot water because nobody wanted them The dead ducklings would be sold to snake breeders as snake food or to street vendors as cooking ingredients Animal activists called the practice 'barbaric', but they said such animal cruelty is not unique to China It's estimated that 2.5 billion day-old male chicks are killed worldwide in a process known as 'chick culling'
